extendedInfo.description: If you are Az Yet's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Az Yet's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Az Yet's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Az Yet's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Az Yet************************List of lyrics ************************- Care For Me- Every Little Bit Of My Heart- Hard To Say I'm Sorry- I Don't Want to Be Lonely- Inseparable Lovers- Last Night- Sadder Than Blue- Saved For Someone Else- Secrets- That's All I Want- Through My Heart (The Arrow)- Time To End The Story

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s3
reviews.comment: This is the best app you could download if your looking for lyrics to a son
reviews.author: Isaac Villegas
